channel.title: What would you like to see in Refined Power?
channel.description:
We have an upcoming update to RP (Refined Power) that includes gas power and we thought what would you like to see coming to RP? We have never asked this question before other than taking suggestions and doing bug/balancing reports and we would like to see what you would want to see coming to the mod! We will take almost any idea if possible or we are up to do it so please do tell us what you would like to see come to the mod!
IMPORTANT!: What "we" means is me and Mrhid6, and I got permission to post this about asking you guys what y'all want!.

item.title: What would you like to see in Refined Power?
item.dc:creator: @I_m_a_chicken29 Im A Chicken29
item.description:
@I_m_a_chicken29 wrote:

yes and yes, we know and we will do that someday but not after the ficsit farming overhaul

Read full topic
item.source: What would you like to see in Refined Power?

item.title: What would you like to see in Refined Power?
item.dc:creator: @Erik_Vermaas Erik Vermaas
item.description:
@Erik_Vermaas wrote:

I agree. Batteries would be a great addition. I have remote miners and put multiple bio-generetors around them just so i can put plenty of bio-fuel in them so they can run for a while on their own. Would love to manage batteries there and charge them from the bio-fuel while I am around to check on things. Also for handling spikes and shortages. Since energy is such a major asset in this game. Handling charging/discharging & all would be nice.
Chargable vehicles would be cool too.

Read full topic
item.source: What would you like to see in Refined Power?

item.title: What would you like to see in Refined Power?
item.dc:creator: @I_m_a_chicken29 Im A Chicken29
item.description:
@I_m_a_chicken29 wrote:

we do like the generator idea but and to the nuclear waste, it’s a no, my guy, sorry but that needs a lot of work to think on the balancing. As for the general balancing we will always do that and will never stop

Read full topic
item.source: What would you like to see in Refined Power?

item.title: What would you like to see in Refined Power?
item.dc:creator: @JasonFJ Jason Fj
item.description:
@JasonFJ wrote:

It would be nice if you can continue to focus on balance with the vanilla game. One additional thing would be a way to process nuclear waste: there is a basic mod that cheats it away, and an extremely complex mod that requires 12 different resources to get rid of it. If you… maybe you could make nuclear waste a usable resource in the one of the arc reactors or dyson sphere to provide some incentive to develop the nuclear plant and go beyond that.

Read full topic

item.title: What would you like to see in Refined Power?
item.dc:creator: @Callsign_Sparky Callsign Sparky
item.description:
@Callsign_Sparky wrote:

Portable generator made in the equipment workshop(similar to the portable miner) that provides enough power to open the pods to get hard drives, it would prevent having to run miles of power lines at an early point in the game; make it very fuel inefficient to balance it against standard powerplants?

item.title: What would you like to see in Refined Power?
item.dc:creator: @FY-23_7734 Fy 23 7734
item.description:
@FY-23_7734 wrote:

S.A.M. Power
A very complicated way to refine this (yet) useless material into some sort of fuel. Could be used in Fuel/ Coal power plants.
(I counted 9 S.A.M nodes so far, but i’m not sure if that’s due to the unobtainium mod)

Recycling Burner
Something like the Awsome sink in, but delivers power from it.

Gravity liquid generator
A small device that you can hook up to your pipeline after it went downhill for a while.

Updraft generator
Only able to build in the dessert.

Gas Generator
Refine Oil into gas and smth else (HOR, Fuel ect.) Burn and produce energy

These are just some of my ideas.

Read full topic
item.source: What would you like to see in Refined Power?

item.title: What would you like to see in Refined Power?
item.dc:creator: @J_Null Legowaffles
item.description:
@J_Null wrote:

With all due respect, tedious and hideous is not difficulty.

Regardless, if that is the decision, so be it.

They’ll run 24/7 without any effort from me once set up and pump out more power than the Turbofuel setup regardless.

EDIT: Admittedly, placing power poles in a manner that doesn’t look like garbage is a challenge.

Read full topic

item.source: What would you like to see in Refined Power?

item.title: What would you like to see in Refined Power?
item.dc:creator: @J_Null Legowaffles
item.description:
@J_Null wrote:

Just finished building an Automated Biomass Generator power plant. Designed to perfectly feed 1,350 Automated Biomass Generators.

I figured, “it was added by a mod, surely they would have more than one power connection, so I can Daisy Chain them for nice sane power lines.”

I’ll be honest, I completely rage quit the moment I discovered, after the fact, that I in fact, cannot Daisy Chain them.

A request I imagine isn’t actually complex: give all power generation buildings added by the Refined Power mod a total of two power line connections. This will allow us to chain them together, and give the last in the chain to a power pole for nice power lines.

In the mean time, I’ve sunk far, FAR too much time into this power plant, so I’m just going to resort to the MaxMod: Power Pole Mk.10 .

Apologies if I seem rude, I’m still attempting to slowly add power lines, and the rage is still simmering as a result.

Read full topic
item.source: What would you like to see in Refined Power?

item.description:
@Ivan_K wrote:

also the solar power can be much much more refined… i would prefer the core unit with the batteries should be a different structures on its own then users will build the sollar array themselves and connect it to the core…

i really enjoyed solar power and i think it can be improved so much… having individual solar array into solar farm… and also maybe advanced solar power is by having a solar farm focusing sun to a steam generator as it is done in real life

item.title: What would you like to see in Refined Power?
item.dc:creator: @Ivan_K Cresscendo
item.description:
@Ivan_K wrote:

hello may i suggest several ideas for “Energy Storage”? Batteries are boring and feels low tier, there are several grid-scale energy storage system we actually have for real, i would like to suggest 2 of those:

  • fancier gravity based system being developed by a startup in europe
    https://www.popularmechanics.com/technology/infrastructure/a29463165/concrete-block-energy-storage/

  • and a more straight forward compressed energy storage (usually in form of gas or water) where unused energy are powering pumps to convert energy to something tangible like water and then when there is a need, in case of water, it is pumped back into a hydro turbine to convert back the pumped water into electricity (which the mod already has one) and for a storage we do have tanks in game! this will create a more complex uses of those already in-game assets for new practical uses

RenewEconomy – 17 Jul 19

Australia’s first compressed air energy storage system gets development approval

S.A. government awards planning approval for compressed air energy storage system, a national first and another big step forward for clean energy in Australia.

Read full topic
item.source: What would you like to see in Refined Power?

item.title: What would you like to see in Refined Power?
item.dc:creator: @ah42 Ah42
item.description:
@ah42 wrote:

I would second the idea of a power storage device. It’s a must with something like solar power that only work during certain times of the day.
Even for just the base game without solar, some sort of capacitance device would be hugely beneficial for covering load spikes, and preventing the need to extremely over-engineer your power production.

Read full topic
